resources.string:
-NOTICE:Look at the \'Guide\' if you are new!

--------------
-Recent changes
- Add configurable dock icon selector colors

- Remove non-working transparency option from dock icon tint

- Delete zone tweaks for shrink top, shrink bottom

- Folder overscroll bounds (patch from AOSP)

- Add partial support for Chinese locales

April 2012, Chislon Chow
